summary: Forester, a ruthless oil baron, wants to create a war between the native American tribes and the white men. Old Shatterhand, Winnetou and their sidekick Castlepool try to prevent this.
cast: Lex Barker|Pierre Brice|Anthony Steel|Karin Dor|Klaus Kinski|Renato Baldini|Terence Hill|Marie-Noëlle Barre|Ilija Ivezic|Velimir Chytil|Stojan 'Stole' Arandjelovic|Djordje Nenadovic|Mirko Boman|Rikard Brzeska|Eddi Arent|Curt Ackermann|Rainer Brandt|Miroslav Buhin|Hans-Walter Clasen|Gerd Duwner|Thomas Eckelmann|Horst Frank|Hellmut Grube|Gert Günther Hoffmann|Sime Jagarinac|Claus Jurichs|Jozo Kovacevic|Ivo Kristof|Gerd Martienzen|Gojko Mitic|Antun Nalis|Siegfried Schürenberg|Hans Wocke
title: La carabina de plata
